top_comments.comment: Oh wow your cooking it so yummy thank you👍🏻
I'm so proud to say I'm a new subscriber, I'm a grandma raising my grandchild, I loved to bake. But you make it fun to relearn, your family is lucky to have you.

comments_since_last_sample.body: I would love it if you had cookbooks. I realize I can print your recipes, but I would definitely buy a book if you had one.
They look amazing! 🤩 I’m going to recreate them with oatmeal flour and some low-carb sweetener, I think it should work. I’ll keep you guys posted if anyone is interested 😉
Would it be possible to omit some of the butter (ever so little) and put in a couple tablespoons of Maple syrup?
Love this! Can you freeze the cookies after baking them?
I'm so proud to say I'm a new subscriber, I'm a grandma raising my grandchild, I loved to bake. But you make it fun to relearn, your family is lucky to have you.
